extension.summary: Little Racun - Bridge Stremio with Kodi
extension.description: Little Racun bridges the Stremio addon AIO Metadata (aiometadata.elfhosted.com) with Kodi, providing seamless access to multiple streaming catalogs and metadata sources. Supports TMDB, TVDB, MAL, Netflix, HBO Max, Disney+, and more. Integrates with Stremio Bridge, Fen Light, Otaku, and other Kodi players.
